abstract: Taliban claims responsibility for truck bomb at government compound in Qalat, Afghanistan, that killed at least one person and injured more than 70.
lead_paragraph: At least one person besides the bomber was killed by the explosion when a truck bomb detonated near the building that housed Zabul’s provincial council.

headline.main: More Than 70 Wounded in Bombing of Afghan Government Compound
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Afghanistan: Scores Hurt in Bombing

snippet: At least one person besides the bomber was killed by the explosion when a truck bomb detonated near the building that housed Zabul’s provincial council.
